name: The Clock Tower (pencil test)
description:
this is my first code Jam :)

Mission:

your mission is to collect all 3 gears in this clock tower to fix the great clock tower of the city.

Controls:

arrow keys :  movement

space bar   and   up arrow :     jump

pause :   Enter

unpause :  Shift

Development:

I first tried to make a game based on factory but the graphics were not looking great and factory are not machines, so later i got an idea of making a clock tower and vertical levels and that became the game.

after getting the idea i created every thing but forget to change the graphics with pencil drawing so everything was drawn in the last day so i didn't get the time to create more things like more background layer with animation gears and stuff.

2-3 day before the deadline somehow all the level and game data were lost. luckily i had an older version of the game so game data was rescued but level data was lost i then i stated creating every thing from start. i think that helped me a bit because then i was able to fix something problems and also updated the level editor.

The game was completed minutes before the deadline but i still have a lot of fun. I might develop this game more with better controls, graphics and stuff.
